channel.title: Bots Stop?
channel.description: Hey everyone. Lately ive been doing alot of AutoPestControl on my main. The bots would run for a good 3 hours, then just shut off and logout. Im using RsBots.net and i wanna know if there is any way to make them go for longer? Im using a vps while i bot, so i wanna bot for 3 days of this week while im gone. Just post here how to change that, it may be my bad internet regarding there is like, 6 people connecting to it. Anyways, let me know if there is a way, thanks.

item.title: Bots Stop?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:9, topic:357453”]It could be very possible that your internet connection drops out for a moment and your account logs out. Otherwise there may be somewhere in your script that it logs out for you. The first option seems most probable to me.[/quote]When the first one happens, it auto-logs you back in.

Read full topic

item.title: Bots Stop?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

It could be very possible that your internet connection drops out for a moment and your account logs out. Otherwise there may be somewhere in your script that it logs out for you. The first option seems most probable to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Bots Stop?
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

Well if i get banned after spending over $120 on bots ill be pretty pissed off.
My friend botted 4 Days straight with 8 hour breaks at night. I tried doing that but it always just shuts off.
Anyways, thanks for the tips guys, keep posting

Read full topic

item.title: Bots Stop?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“wolfs goal, post:5, topic:357453”]Well that being, is it a paid bot from rsbots or a free bot from powerbot?

If it’s a paid bot, then it’s trying to make your moneys worth…if free bot, well might as well just write banned all over you[/quote]

A paid vs free bot means nothing to how fast you get banned.

A paid bot can be used just as much or even more then a free bot.

Paid bots are getting more and more banned more frequently, because they are over used, and players think they are safe.

As for free bots, new updates come out weekly, and new bots come out, meaning it is a less likely chance to get banned.

Read full topic

any longer and u get banned thats y they added the logout feature

Hey everyone. Lately ive been doing alot of AutoPestControl on my main. The bots would run for a good 3 hours, then just shut off and logout. Im using RsBots.net and i wanna know if there is any way to make them go for longer? Im using a vps while i bot, so i wanna bot for 3 days of this week while im gone.
